column2: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.
column9: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Brian Dennehy

column2: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
column9: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn, Paul Winfield
